None.Name: Melting away
None.Description: Heats up the environment in such a way as to make every hostile Ice Shield within 25m radius melt down by 50 points per second. The heat will prevent affected enemies from receiving an Ice Shield. Lasts for 20 second. Reusable every 25 seconds.
